page.title: 18Living in the Town
page.content: Many of the buildings in the town of Banff are very old. I live, with my parents and brother, in an old part of the town.My dad is a lawyer here, his office is in Low Street. Sometimes my mum is asked to teach home economics at the Academy when they are short staffed.I prefer it when she stays at home. During the week we usually stay at home and watch television. At the weekend we do our shopping. We buy very little in Banff.All our clothes are bought in Aberdeen and most of our food. We go in about once a month and bulk buy our food from one of the large superstores. Because of limited choice, we only buy small items in the local shops. Sometimes,I wander through town with my friends,or go to the local park to cycle and play on the swings. I like Banff but wish it had more shops.
